description: Read Slack conversations, threads, user info, and search messages from your MCP client.

environmentVariables.name: SLACK_USER_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Slack User OAuth Token (starts with xoxp-). Get from https://api.slack.com/apps

environmentVariables.name: SLACK_BOT_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Slack Bot User OAuth Token (starts with xoxb-). Alternative to user token.

environmentVariables.name: SLACK_WORKSPACE_URL
environmentVariables.description: Your Slack workspace URL (e.g., https://your-company.slack.com). Required for generating message links.
